http.title: Auto Accident Attorneys Midvale UT | Tillotson Johnson, PLLC
http.html:
• Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google
  • Free Consultation
  • Call Us: (801) 565-1515
  • Review Us
  • Home
  • Practice Areas
    • Auto Accident
    • Dog Bite
    • Premises Liability Claims and Slip-and-Fall Cases
  • Free Consultation
  • About Us
    • Have you been in a wreck?
  • Blog
  • Contact
Select Page

TJ Auto Law
Your Utah Auto Accident Attorneys

Contact us today for a free consultation.

CONTACT US

Injured in an accident?

Call NOW for your free consultation!

CALL US NOW

Never pay anything until your case resolves

Learn More

Your Utah Auto Accident Attorneys

At TJ Auto Law we are proud to offer experienced and trustworthy legal representation for any and all accidents. We specialize in auto accidents, and also cover dog bites and slip-and-fall injuries. In the event of an accident, you can be facing medical bills, missed time at work, repair costs, and more. The paperwork alone is a mountain of headaches, and it can be crucial to your case – so leave it to us.

TJ Auto Law can handle your case from start to finish. We have handled hundreds of cases to help other clients like you recover money for their injuries and troubles. Our goal is to take all of the stress from your shoulders. We can cover your paperwork, file claims, follow up with insurance companies and government agencies, represent you in court, and help recover thousands to help you get back on your feet.

5

Why should you hire an accident attorney?

5

When should you hire an accident attorney?

5

Why choose TJ Auto Law?

Why choose TJ Auto Law? Because your money is valuable, and we’re not trying to take it from you. We take only 30% of the final settlement amount, lower than all of our competitors. We work hard to get you the maximum settlement, and then you get to take more of it home.

TJ Auto Law also has a reputation for being kind and personable. We explain your case and options in a clear and concise way, with no condescension. We listen to your full story, and care about your life as a whole. We know what an accident can mean financially, physically, mentally, and emotionally. TJ Law is here to guide you through it with some peace of mind.

If you’ve been a victim of an auto accident, slip-and-fall injury, premises liability injury, or dog bite – call or email us for a free consultation right away. We’re standing by to help you take the next steps.

Have an Urgent Question?

If you have an urgent question, we are here to help.

Call Us: (801) 565-1515

CONTACT US

Have a question? We’re here to help!

  • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

Why choose TJ Auto Law?

v

Communication

We want to be available any time you need us, that means every client gets the attorney’s cell phone number as well as the office information.



Smaller Fees

This means that you get to keep more of your settlement.



Personal Service

We are a small firm with big firm experience.  We make sure you get personal experience because we know each and every one of our clients personally.

Initial Consultations Are Always Complimentary

Request Consultation

DIRECTIONS

GOOGLE+

PRACTICE AREAS

  • Auto Accidents
  • Dog Bite
  • Premises Liability
  • Slip-and-Fall

PRACTICE INFO

TJ Auto Law, PLLC
 Auto Accident Attorneys
(801) 565-1515
info@tjautolaw.com
7324 Union Park Ave #201
Midvale, UT 84047

TJ Auto Law © 2017   |   Contact Us

http.title: Welcome - Essential Content
http.robots:
Sitemap: https://essential-content.com/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://essential-content.com/news-sitemap.xml
User-agent: *
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Allow: /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php
http.html:
Skip to content

Essential Content

Crafting Your Company's Story – Making Every Word Count

  • Home
  • Attributes and Services
  • Our Philosophies
  • Portfolio
    • Bylined Articles
    • Success Stories
  • About Us
  • Contact Us
Scroll down to content

Welcome

Essential Content is branding and communications crafted to help you realize your vision.


RELEVANT

For your content to resonate with your audience it must be relevant. We take the time to understand you, your products, and your market. We simplify the complex and deliver content that generates results.


TIMELY

Time waits for no one, and neither should you. Our reputation and success is built upon addressing your needs quickly and efficiently. Delivering what you need, when you need it.


EFFECTIVE

Results are key. Everything we do is designed around having an impact and delivering tangible results – whether that is inquiries,  impressions, or articles published, we track everything we do.

RESULTS-ORIENTED  ~   METRICS-DRIVEN

Working together we will identify and prioritize the activities and projects necessary to grow your business. From a single deliverable to a complete rebranding initiative, we have the experience and flexibility to partner with you in your growth.
We invest in you and your strategic plans for the future. We help you grow your business by knowing your business. Our goal is to help elevate awareness of your business and build your brand and your revenue stream–making every word count.
Proudly powered by WordPress
